title: #98: West Point in 1915 With Michael Haskew
description: West Point's graduating class of 1915 produced some of America's greatest military leaders including Eisenhower and Omar Bradley. Author and historian Michael Haskew calls it "the class the stars fell on". In today's podcast I talk to Michael about his book West Point 1915 and the men who made up this class and what made them so special.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
